body_html: Thanks for the quick reply. Not sure about it, but it seems that without the tf.layers.Network and tf.layers.Input, the rest of the function based layers have a rather limited use. Anyway, looking forward to the future releases.

body: Thanks for the quick reply. Not sure about it, but it seems that without the tf.layers.Network and tf.layers.Input, the rest of the function based layers have a rather limited use. Anyway, looking forward to the future releases.
